location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire to Alfred Cotton Way

mods.abstract: Letter informing Way that he has received a report from the Sharja agent that the Debai [Dubai] chief and the Wahabee [Wahhabi] Lieutenant at Beraymee [Buraimi] have been communicating with a view to aiding Syad Torkee [Turki bin Said] and requesting that he verify this information.The letter goes on to discuss the issue of the governorship of Bunder Abbass [Bandar Abbas] which has not yet been settled, and Earl Canning's expected arrival in the Gulf with Hubert Izaak Walton.
